data.title: Michael Barrett: 5 Things To Know About Anna Faris’ Third Husband
data.meta_description: We've got five things to know about Michael Barrett, Anna Faris' husband.
data.text:
Anna Faris is an actress most known for her work in movies like The House Bunny and the Scary Movie franchise.

She was previously married to actor Chris Pratt from 2009 to 2018.

Anna married her current husband, Michael Barrett in 2021.

She currently hosts the hit podcast, Anna Faris is Unqualified.

Anna Faris, 46, is a married woman once more, as she confirmed that she “eloped” with her longtime boyfriend, Michael Barrett. The big reveal was shared on the actress’ podcast, Anna Faris Is Unqualified, on July 19, 2021 — one day before Michael first sparked wedding speculation by wearing a ring out in public.

“I think we’ve spent the last year in a place of reflection, in a place of kind of prioritization to some degree, a place of anxiety, a place of like, whatever, assessment. But I’m looking around, just so, just my fiancé’s right…he’s now my husband,” she said. After being showered with messages of congratulations, Anna apologized to Michael for blurting out the news.

“Yes, we eloped…I’m sorry. I didn’t know… I’m sorry, honey. I just blurted that out, but it just feels [like] I can’t say fiancé anymore,” she said to Michael. “Thank you, it was awesome. It feels great. It was at a local courthouse up in Washington state. It was great.” Most recently, in Feb. 2023, the blonde beauty went nearly nude and starred in a Super Bowl commercial about avocados. She also shared the clip via Instagram, which you can see here.

Want to know more about Michael? Here are five interesting facts about him:

Anna & Michael Fell Fast For Each Other

The pair met in May of 2017 while filming the reboot of the 1987 rom-com Overboard in Vancouver, BC. Four months later Anna and Chris split, and in Sept. 2017 Anna and Michael were photographed on a date at the Malibu Chili Cookoff. A few weeks later they were spotted getting cozy at Malibu’s famous Neptune’s Net roadside diner and they’ve been the picture of bliss ever since.

As A Cinematographer, Michael Has Worked On Major Films

He was the director of photography on films including Zookeeper, Ted, Ted 2, and Kiss Kiss Bang Bang.

Michael Got His Break On A CBS Crime Drama

After getting his start shooting music videos and short films, Michael worked on the hit procedural since it’s 2001 inception and was the director of photography on 31 episodes through 2004. He also worked on CSI: Miami, shooting five episodes in 2004.

Michael Is A Native Californian

He was born and raised in Riverside, CA. He attended UCLA, initially studying history, then he began taking film classes. Michael eventually went on to study film at NYC’s Columbia University.

Michael & Anna Kept Their Nuptials A Secret
